Guía de Prompts para Generador de Imágenes (DALL-E, Midjourney, etc.)
Para todos los iconos, el estilo base debe ser: "Minimalist scientific icon, flat vector style, clean thin lines (2pt thickness), geometric, solid bone white background color, no shadows, no gradients, professional technical illustration."
2. El problema de la causalidad
• Concepto: Lazo de retroalimentación o homeostasis [46, 1.2, 75].
• Prompt: "Minimalist scientific icon, a circle formed by two thin arrows pointing in opposite directions, top arrow is blue, bottom arrow is red, representing a circular feedback loop of homeostasis, flat vector style, thin lines, solid bone white background."
3. Simplicidad, complejidad y límites
• Concepto: Jerarquía de los niveles de organización biológica [53, 57, 1.16].
• Prompt: "Minimalist scientific icon, square frame, five concentric thin geometric circles, color gradient starting with blue in the center and transitioning to red at the outermost circle, representing expanding levels of biological organization, flat vector style, thin lines, solid bone white background."
4. Crisis del ideal positivista
• Concepto: Ruptura de la linealidad mediante una mutación puntual.
• Prompt: "Minimalist scientific icon, circular frame, an abstract DNA double helix made of two thin wavy parallel lines in blue and yellow, one line has a single solid red dot interrupting the sequence to represent a point mutation, flat vector style, thin lines, solid bone white background."
5. Racionalidad humana real
• Concepto: Integración de los lóbulos de la corteza cerebral [1710, 35.21].
• Prompt: "Minimalist scientific icon, circular silhouette of a human brain cortex, internally divided into four clean geometric sections colored orange, pink, cyan, and green to represent the cerebral lobes, flat vector style, thin lines, solid bone white background."
6. Salida constructiva: ciencia hoy
• Concepto: El modelo de la "Red de la Vida" (Web of Life) [1005, 20.16].
• Prompt: "Minimalist scientific icon, square frame, a network of scattered dots or nodes connected by thin straight lines that intersect horizontally, using primary colors red, blue and yellow, representing a non-hierarchical web of life, flat vector style, thin lines, solid bone white background."
